title: Wireshark.org
description: Wireshark is the world's foremost and widely-used network protocol analyzer. It lets you see what's happening on your network at a microscopic level and is the de facto (and often de jure) standard across many commercial and non-profit enterprises, government agencies, and educational institutions. I designed and built this site using Astro & Tailwind.

title: Wireshark Foundation Component Library
description: I built a component library for the Wireshark Foundation using Astro, TypeScript, and Tailwind. It is used to build the Wireshark site.

title: TourPro
description: TourPro is a platform for touring performers that need a structured way to organize logistics for their tours.

title: StackHawk Marketing Site
description: I helped to build and maintain the StackHawk.com domain. It was built using Gatsby, HubSpot & Contentful.

title: Access Health
description: I built a crowdfunding platform for people who can't afford their medical bills. Made using React, Redux, Rails, the Stripe API, AWS and Material UI

title: SharkFest US
description: SharkFest™, launched in 2008, is a series of annual educational conferences staged in various parts of the globe and focused on sharing knowledge, experience and best practices among the Wireshark® developer and user communities. I built the website for their US and Europe events.

title: Wireshark Foundation
description: I built the site for the Wireshark Foundation. The Wireshark Foundation is a non-profit organization helping as many people as possible understand their networks as much as possible.

title: Tali's Recorder Lessons
description: Tali Rubinstein is a world reknowned and Latin Grammy-winning artist. This is her teaching platform, built using React and Parcel, and Semantic UI

title: Low Noon Music
description: Portfolio site for Low Noon Music

title: Tom Pilgrim vs the Universe
description: Tom Pilgrim vs. the Universe is a platforming game that was made in 5 days & is the first game created by Angelo & Maximo. Fight your way through 15 levels of enemies & 3 bosses to achieve victory + get the highest score!

title: Evolfo
description: Evolfo is the sound that breaks through the fuzz on the low end of your radio dial and echoes out the back door of a pink neon lit bar. I used to play drums with them and made their site.

title: My Music
description: This is my music portfolio site with videos, recordings, and links to see more of my musical work.

title: We Are What We Vote
description: We Are What We Vote is a project by real people for real people. A bunch of artists who think it's vitally important for everyone who can to take part in our democracy & that voting should be as easy as ordering coffee came up with this idea. I built this site from the ground up.

title: Brooklyn Birdhouse
description: I built a site for Brooklyn Birdhouse, a NYC based wedding band.
